text:
@JoeBiden It was the pandemic you idiot. You have no right to be the leader of a book club let alone a country. 

Before the coronavirus, our economy was booming. Unemployment low. Trump didn't order this, the Chinese did. And you are celebrating it. Moron.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
